description: Fols. 74; 20.5 x 12.3 cm.; written surface 13.7 x 5.6 cm.; 19 lines to page; on glazed Arabic paper; in Fārisi; with catchwords; entries in red. A commentary on al-Miṣbāḥ Beg.: بسم الله الرحمن الرحىم. الحمد لله الذي خلق الانسان والعقلاء وجعل لهم کل البهاىم والجهلاء Colophon: تمت [تم] کتاب نور المصباح في شعبان سنة ست وستىن وثمانماىة وهذا التارىخ تارىخ لمؤلفه ومصنفه. م Marginal notes and glosses; ruled marginal lines in red. In the introduction the author states that he composed the work A.H. 866 [A.D. 1462] in Marmora during the reign of Sultan Muḥammad II, who reigned A.H. 855-886 [A.D. 1451-1481]. MS in excellent condition; Arabic binding. Rare. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
author: Qarah Sinān, Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd al-Malik, 15th cent
